title: How would you like it if?
creator_credit: Nicholas Cockram, Brian Hannant, South Australian Film Corporation and Slater Sound Studio
brief_description: A film about moral issues based on the philosophy ‘Think about the deed before you do it - consider other people’. Dramatised excerpts of unsocial behaviour are presented followed by questions asked about the incident portrayed. The content includes examples of wrecking an older brother’s paintings, swearing, shoplifting, school fights and ethnic discrimination.
